languages.text: {n}Иокаста до хруста в костяшках сжимает кулаки.{/n} "Предатель ряженый! А я твои проповеди слушала, помазание на службу принимала. Ты свои слова обратно проглотишь, вместе с выбитыми зубами!" {n}Преподобный не удостаивает Иокасту ни словом, ни взглядом.{/n}

{n}Sauerback clenches her fists until her knuckles crunch.{/n} "You treasonous impostor! To think that I listened to your sermons and was anointed by your hand. You will choke on your words along with the teeth I am about to knock out!" {n}Adalbert dignifies her with neither a word nor a glance.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Иокаста до хруста в костяшках сжимает кулаки.{/n} "Предатель ряженый! А я твои проповеди слушала, помазание на службу принимала. Ты свои слова обратно проглотишь, вместе с выбитыми зубами!" {n}Преподобный не удостаивает Иокасту ни словом, ни взглядом.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Jocasta clenches her fists until her knuckles crunch.{/n} "You treasonous impostor! To think that I listened to your sermons and was anointed by your hand. You will choke on your words along with the teeth I am about to knock out!" {n}The Reverend dignifies Jocasta with neither a word nor a glance.{/n}

You will choke on your words along with the teeth I am about to knock out!" {n}Adalbert dignifies her with neither a word nor a glance.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Sauerback ballt die Fäuste, bis ihre Knöchel knacken.{/n} "Ihr verräterischer Hochstapler! Und auf Eure Predigten habe ich gehört, Eure Hand hat mich gesalbt. Ihr werdet an Euren Worten ersticken, zusammen mit den Zähnen, die ich Euch ausschlagen werde!" {n}Adalbert würdigt sie weder eines Wortes noch eines Blicks.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Sauerback clenches her fists until her knuckles crunch.{/n} "You treasonous impostor! To think that I listened to your sermons and was anointed by your hand. You will choke on your words along with the teeth I am about to knock out!" {n}Adalbert dignifies her with neither a word nor a glance.{/n}

Ihr werdet an Euren Worten ersticken, zusammen mit den Zähnen, die ich Euch ausschlagen werde!" {n}Adalbert würdigt sie weder eines Wortes noch eines Blicks.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Sauerback aprieta los puños hasta que le crujen los nudillos.{/n} «¡Impostor traicionero! Y pensar que me tragué sus sermones y fui ungida por su mano. ¡Se le atragantarán esas palabras junto con los dientes que estoy a punto de saltarle a golpes!». {n}Adalbert ni siquiera se digna a mirarla o a responder.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Sauerback clenches her fists until her knuckles crunch.{/n} "You treasonous impostor! To think that I listened to your sermons and was anointed by your hand. You will choke on your words along with the teeth I am about to knock out!" {n}Adalbert dignifies her with neither a word nor a glance.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Sauerback aprieta los puños hasta que le crujen los nudillos.{/n} «¡Impostor traicionero! Y pensar que me tragué sus sermones y fui ungida por su mano. ¡Se le atragantarán esas palabras junto con los dientes que estoy a punto de saltarle a golpes!». {n}Adalbert ni siquiera se digna a mirarla o a responder.{/n}

languages.text: {n}ザウアーバックは拳を握り締める。{/n}「この裏切り者のペテン師が！その説教を聞き、その手で聖油を注がれたと思うと…今から歯をへし折って、それと一緒に貴様の言葉も喉に詰まらせてくれる！」{n}アダルバートはそれを聞いても、彼女をチラリとも見やしない。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Sauerback clenches her fists until her knuckles crunch.{/n} "You treasonous impostor! To think that I listened to your sermons and was anointed by your hand. You will choke on your words along with the teeth I am about to knock out!" {n}Adalbert dignifies her with neither a word nor a glance.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}ザウアーバックは拳を握り締める。{/n}「この裏切り者のペテン師が！その説教を聞き、その手で聖油を注がれたと思うと…今から歯をへし折って、それと一緒に貴様の言葉も喉に詰まらせてくれる！」{n}アダルバートはそれを聞いても、彼女をチラリとも見やしない。{/n}

languages.text: {n}苏尔贝克握紧了拳头，指节发出了噼啪的响声。{/n}“你这个叛徒！我居然听过你的布道，还被你的手涂过圣膏。我要把你的话塞回你的喉咙里，把你的牙打下来，把你活活呛死！”{n}听了她的话，阿达伯特什么也没说，甚至都没看她一眼。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Sauerback clenches her fists until her knuckles crunch.{/n} "You treasonous impostor! To think that I listened to your sermons and was anointed by your hand. You will choke on your words along with the teeth I am about to knock out!" {n}Adalbert dignifies her with neither a word nor a glance.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}苏尔贝克握紧了拳头，指节发出了噼啪的响声。{/n}“你这个叛徒！我居然听过你的布道，还被你的手涂过圣膏。我要把你的话塞回你的喉咙里，把你的牙打下来，把你活活呛死！”{n}听了她的话，阿达伯特什么也没说，甚至都没看她一眼。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Sauerback serre les poings à s'en faire craquer les phalanges.{/n} « Vous n'êtes qu'un traître doublé d'un imposteur ! Dire que j'ai écouté vos sermons et reçu la consécration de vos mains... Je m'en vais vous faire ravaler vos paroles, et vos dents avec ! » {n}Adalbert ne prend pas la peine de lui répondre, ni même de la regarder.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Sauerback clenches her fists until her knuckles crunch.{/n} "You treasonous impostor! To think that I listened to your sermons and was anointed by your hand. You will choke on your words along with the teeth I am about to knock out!" {n}Adalbert dignifies her with neither a word nor a glance.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Sauerback serre les poings à s'en faire craquer les phalanges.{/n} « Vous n'êtes qu'un traître doublé d'un imposteur ! Dire que j'ai écouté vos sermons et reçu la consécration de vos mains... Je m'en vais vous faire ravaler vos paroles, et vos dents avec ! » {n}Adalbert ne prend pas la peine de lui répondre, ni même de la regarder.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Sauerback parmakları kütürdeyene kadar yumruğunu sıkıyor.{/n} "Seni hain sahtekâr! Vaazlarını dinlediğimi ve senin tarafından kutsandığımı düşünüyorum da... Sözlerinde ve dökmek üzere olduğum dişlerinde boğulacaksın!" {n}Adalbert ona ne bir sözle ne de bir bakışla yanıt veriyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Sauerback clenches her fists until her knuckles crunch.{/n} "You treasonous impostor! To think that I listened to your sermons and was anointed by your hand. You will choke on your words along with the teeth I am about to knock out!" {n}Adalbert dignifies her with neither a word nor a glance.{/n}
